name: The Last Reborn: Dragon's Legend
description:
Hi, 

This is the first demo of The Last Reborn : Dragon's Legend.

It's an alpha demo and I hope you enjoy with it.

The Last Reborn : Dragon's Legend is a third person game where the players live the life of a little tiny dragon.

This one maybe evoluate or not with the action of the player, there is multiple gameplay in the storyline 

I put a google form for have some feedback so please send me this one for upgrade the game.

Thank you very much and Enjoy with baby dragon.

Franck.
